channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Exploring the generated code: the spread element: Behind the scenes of collection expressions - Part 4
item.description: In this post I show what the compiler generates when you use collection expressions with the spread element and how it depends on the collections used Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/behind-the-scenes-of-collection-expressions-part-4-the-spread-element/

item.title: Exploring the generated code: T[], Span<T>, and Immutable collections: Behind the scenes of collection expressions - Part 3
item.description: In this post I look at the code generated when you use collection expressions with T[], ReadOnlySpan, Span, and immutable collections Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/behind-the-scenes-of-collection-expressions-part-3-arrays-span-of-t-and-immutable-collections/
